title: Need help to recreate a logo
content:
Can anyone ID this font. I'm hoping it's not a custom creation.

Many Thanks!!

Jason

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621133214im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3554.jpg)
author: Jason Sadwick

comments.content: well, you could probably take [Asteroid](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621133214/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/victory/regular), squeeze it and fill the inline & be close.
